attributes.action: Make healthy start vouchers available for all children under 16
attributes.additional_details: Currently the nhs healthy start vouchers are for children who are under 5 and parents who qualify as q low income person, but as the cost of living is going up and people are struggling with the cost of food qnd struggling with healthy food then government can help by giving healthy start vouchers to all
attributes.background: With the cost of living rising and people struggling with food the healthy start vouchers hould be widened for all

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614500
